input.sentences: hey | there is that famous guy | i am going to ask him to sign this for me ... he signed it !
i went and found my friends and had them gather around to see what i just got .
then we went out to get on our bikes and ride to a party .
things seemed fun and everyone seemed nice .
but | then | we looked behind us and saw this freaky guy and ran !
output.sentences: The bicyclists guide to theft: Step one - Find an unsuspecting bystandard.
Step two - Check your surroundings. Note anyone that could be a witness.
Step three - make sure there is a clear getaway path to your bicycle.
Step four - when no one is looking, make your move!
Step five - reap the reward of your work! *Special note - make sure no one is standing around with a camera before you check out your loot.*
